0100110101000110 0000011000111101 0 -> sum: 0101001110000011, cout: 0
1110011101101101 0010000111000011 1 -> sum: 0000100100110001, cout: 1
0011000100011110 0111100010111000 0 -> sum: 1010100111010110, cout: 0
1001100100111000 1110111110001001 0 -> sum: 1000100011000001, cout: 1
0101111010101100 1001000011011110 1 -> sum: 1110111110001011, cout: 0
1101110010000100 0111110111001100 0 -> sum: 0101101001010000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
